description:
Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition is a Real-Time Strategy game centered around the medieval
ages and the various battles, conquests, and wars of history.
game: Age Of Empires II: Definitive Edition

0.0.1.description:
This release is barely functional and can only run one Age2scenario file. There is no logic whatsoever at the moment. But for the curious/eager it is here.

Place the folders in the zip file into your local Age of Empires II DE steam folder. You can find the folder either by navigating to `C:/Users/<USER>/Games/Age of Empires 2 DE/<STRING_OF_NUMBERS>/` or by opening Age 2 and opening the scenario editor. From there, click "Open Scenario Folder" and navigate up in your file explorer to the folder that is a long string of numbers.

You will need to also select `C:/Users/<USER>/Games/Age of Empires 2 DE/<STRING_OF_NUMBERS>/` when first running the Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition Client. If you mess this up, it is OK, because there is a command to reselect it.

At the moment, the folder prompt will need to be selected every time you run the client, but the folder should be already selected in the prompt.

## New Contributors
* @Stefrex1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/dmwever/Ageipelago/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/dmwever/Ageipelago/commits/0.0.1
0.0.1.title: Release 0.0.1 - The Proof-of-Concept Release (Unstable) (No Logic)

0.1.0.description:
This release adds the full playthrough of Attila the Hun campaign as a playable AP world.
- Shuffles many triggers into the AP world, such as unlocking Bleda's Camp.
- Shuffles starting resources.

Place the folders in the zip file into your local Age of Empires II DE steam folder. You can find the folder either by navigating to C:/Users/`<USER>`/Games/Age of Empires 2 DE/`<STEAM_ID>`/ or by opening Age 2 and opening the scenario editor. From there, click "Open Scenario Folder" and navigate up in your file explorer to the folder named after your steam id.

You will need to also select C:/Users/`<USER>`/Games/Age of Empires 2 DE/`<STEAM_ID>`/ when first running the Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition Client. If you mess this up, it is OK, because there is a command to reselect it.

If you are stuck or think you found a bug, first click [here](https://github.com/dmwever/Ageipelago/blob/main/docs/AP%20FAQ.md) to view the AP-specific FAQ.
0.1.0.title: Release 0.1.0 - Attila the Hun - Playable Alpha Release

0.1.1.description:
- Fix issue where the client won't connect to a campaign.
- Attila: The Scourge of God: Kill the Iron Boar trigger now properly detects the boar is killed.
- **NEW COMMAND:** /refresh: disconnects and reconnects to the campaign or scenario. Usually only needed when quickly switching between campaigns or standalone scenarios.
0.1.1.title: Release 0.1.1
